tool.name: GTF2GeneList
tool.description: extracts gene ids from Ensembl GTF using rtracklayer
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
Given an Ensembl GTF file, it will extract the list of all gene identifiers in the GTF to a simple tsv file.
**Inputs**
* Ensembl GTF file
-----
**Outputs**
* Gene identifier list in tsv.
